channel.title: Atonement -The Next Ultimate Experience! - Apply Within -
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/rumj2e.jpg[/img]
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,665956.0.html[b]Atonement Advertisement[/url]
We need dedicated and experienced candidates to fill each position. To apply please follow the provided format and do so via this thread or private messaging me.
[spoiler=Positions Available] Founder/ Project Owners: Nolan, Ajax, Michael Community Manager: Nolan Global/ Head Developer: Ajax Chief of Staff: Michael Website Developer: Open Server Developer: Open Client Developer: Open Head Administrator: Open Administrator: Open Administrator: Open Head Moderator: Open Moderator: Open Moderator: Open Moderator: Open Support: Open Support: Open Support: Open Support: Open GFX Designer: Open [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Application Format] [code] Position Applying For: Name: Age: Timezone: Proof of Experience: Vouches (If any): Do you have Skype?: [/code] [/spoiler]

It’s not an issue it’d just be cool if you’d let me know…

item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

nolan2131:

Would you like to post some of your designs? Want to take a look at them.

[spoiler]






[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Vouches]

[QUOTE=Enzyme;4077929]Vouch made me a solid banner, thank you![/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=zer0time;4070612]Thank you Marjin, this is one great piece of work!

VOUCHED, Trusted, and did NOT let me down, again thank you! (y)<3[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=Jerba Guru;4070797]Vouch, did work for me. :)[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=Valiant;4130455]Vouch, Bought from him![/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=Logic;4130483]Vouch, makes good stuff[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=cls orginal;4138831]Vouch, Very nice work :)[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=Velorian;4143839]Vouch for Majin, great work. Banner, logo, and client background for only 4$, great work. Amazing quality for the price.

His banner:

[center][/center][/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=Jessee;4150474]Vouch for this guy, happy with the work he has done for me and deal went smooth :).[/QUOTE]

[/spoiler]

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:11, topic:547060”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665960.msg4452274#msg4452274 date=1412376000]

-Not a formal application-
I can try and help out with client/server stuff. I can do web developer stuff, but in no way is it the best. I never dug deeper than I had to with it. You’ve already got my skype so yea…

Ryan said you’re officially working with website?

I wasn’t aware Ryan was working with you… You told me he was your friend who needed services… So er yea. Idk anymore rofl…
[/quote]

Uhhh, why? :|[/quote]
No I mean idk what’s happening anymore lol…

Read full topic
